usage_notes: This file controls which data file sets are validated in batch mode.
Paths are relative to the input_base_directory.
If 'include' is non-empty: Only listed data file sets are validated (allowlist).
If 'include' is empty and 'exclude' is non-empty: All EXCEPT listed are validated (blocklist).
If both empty: No filtering occurs (all data file sets are validated).
If both non-empty: 'include' takes precedence (allowlist mode).
